title.rendered: Tifton Walls of Books NOW OPEN!

content.rendered:
The store in Tifton, GA is beautiful and FULL of books!  More details can be found on the Locations page.  Come see Lois and Lacy for their great selection of fiction, kids, westerns, and Christian books… and bring yours for trade credit!

The store is located in the vibrant downtown Tifton.  There are tons of shopping options… everything from clothing to antiques to furniture… and, now books!
